content.html: An irrelevant metric. As absurd as IBM’s attempt to pay COBOL devs by lines of code. Ideally you ship 50 lines that are intelligent vs a bunch of AI generated shit. Just saying, cuz this thinking is gonna fail companies in a big way. They’re already really bad at this.
content.value:
An irrelevant metric. As absurd as IBM’s attempt to pay COBOL devs by lines of code.

Ideally you ship 50 lines that are intelligent vs a bunch of AI generated shit. 

Just saying, cuz this thinking is gonna fail companies in a big way. They’re already really bad at this.
